projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive, SEO-optimized portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features include dark/light mode toggle, multi-language support, project showcase, blog section, and a contact form. Deployed on Vercel for fast global delivery.

projects.title: Duolingo Clone Project
projects.description: A clone of Duolingoâ€™s core lesson flow built with React and Redux, featuring interactive exercises, progress tracking, and responsive design.

projects.title: Sparka Smart Parking System
projects.description: Built a Smart Parking System with role-based interfaces for users, admins, and operators. Frontend in Next.js, backend in Lumen PHP handling reservations and realtime updates. Deployed on GCP with Docker & Cloud Run.

projects.title: Quire.my.id Job Search AI
projects.description: Building an AI-powered job search platform for Gemastik XVII. The prompt-based search feature is specifically designed for job seekers with disabilities, with separate repositories for each AI model.

projects.title: RAIHARC Community Website
projects.description: A one-page minimalist site for the Robotics Artificial Intelligence Hardware and Application Research Community (RAIHARC). Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth GSAP-powered scroll animations, responsive design, and clear calls-to-action to join the community. Deployed for fast global access.

projects.title: Remosto Recommendation System
projects.description: Created a responsive web platform with dynamic maps and AI-driven item recommendations using computer vision. Built RESTful API endpoints and conducted end-to-end testing with Cypress.

projects.title: Telkomsel Internal Dashboard
projects.description: Built an internal KPI visualization dashboard for PT Telkomunikasi Seluler using Next.js and Python. Developed server-side components for efficient data querying and enhanced diagram readability for operations teams.

projects.title: Uphoria API CRUD
projects.description: Developed a maintainable backend with Laravel 9 and MySQL, leveraging Eloquent ORM for data modeling, implementing authentication & authorization, and organizing modular controllers for clean architecture.

projects.title: PeriGigi Web Enhancement
projects.description: Enhanced a private clinic website by adding payment pages and automated PDF invoice generation using React and Bootstrap. Collaborated with backend teams and contributed to a private Git repository via SSH.

projects.title: LoRa Realtime Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a realtime monitoring interface for LoRa-based smart lighting at PT Global Data Inspirasi. Integrated Flask REST API with MQTT pub/sub on the Antares platform, connecting physical IoT devices to the web UI.

projects.title: Petaniku Web App
projects.description: A Laravel-based agriculture marketplace prototype built for Gemastik (UNNES). Featured product listings, user authentication, and basic transaction flows.

projects.title: Appstro API Service
projects.description: Built a RESTful API using Express.js and Firestore, implementing secure CRUD operations and data validation for a project management tool.

projects.title: PPAM Kes Survey Platform
projects.description: Developed a survey platform API with Fastify and PostgreSQL. Migrated legacy Excel data, designed secure endpoints, and deployed on a VPS with Nginx and SSL.

projects.title: Sunrise Project
projects.description: Implemented user-project and many-to-many relationships using GORM in Go, optimizing database schema and service layer for performance.
